statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_interaction_date FROM customers WHERE interaction_count < 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE last_interaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, interaction_count FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE past_interactions > 5;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_time, interaction_message FROM CustomerDetails JOIN ChatbotLogs ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = ChatbotLogs.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_time FROM CustomerDetails JOIN ChatbotLogs ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = ChatbotLogs.customer_id WHERE CustomerDetails.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerDetails JOIN ChatbotLogs ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = ChatbotLogs.customer_id GROUP BY CustomerDetails.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE past_interactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM ChatbotLogs GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, past_interactions, interaction_message FROM CustomerDetails JOIN ChatbotLogs ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = ChatbotLogs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) as total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, JSON_EXTRACT(personalization_data, '$.theme') as theme FROM chatbot_personalization;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, i.interaction_timestamp FROM customers c INNER JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id AND i.interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY i.interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers c LEFT JOIN chatbot_personalization p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.personalization_data ->> 'theme' = 'dark' ORDER BY c.first_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM customers c LEFT JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING num_interactions > 3 ORDER BY num_interactions DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT name, email, last_interacted_at FROM customers WHERE last_interacted_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM chatbot_responses
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John' ORDER BY last_interacted_at DESC;

SELECT c.name, ci.interaction_timestamp, cr.response_text FROM customers c INNER JOIN chatbot_interactions ci ON c.id = ci.customer_id INNER JOIN chatbot_responses cr ON ci.interaction_id = cr.interaction_id;

SELECT c.name, ci.interaction_timestamp, cr.response_text FROM customers c LEFT JOIN chatbot_interactions ci ON c.id = ci.customer_id LEFT JOIN chatbot_responses cr ON ci.interaction_id = cr.interaction_id WHERE c.id = 1;
SELECT c.name, pi.personalized_text FROM customers c INNER JOIN personalized_interactions pi ON c.id = pi.customer_id WHERE c.phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE customer_id = 2 AND preference_name LIKE '%notification%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT chatbot_response, response_time FROM ChatbotHistory WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY response_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_name LIKE '%color%' AND preference_value = 'blue';
